document_data.name: Amarith Coppervein
document_data.mainbody: '''Amarith Coppervein''' was a [[dwarf]] in the [[Underdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Amarith was a member of the [[Emerald Enclave]] and one of the students of [[Morista Malkin]] in [[Gauntlgrym]]. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she went alone into Underdark, where she created her own personal zoo.
document_data.Relationship: Amarith was on good terms with [[Sladis Vadir]], a fellow student of Morista living in [[Mantol-Derith]].
